actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor and memory of the Jews persecuted and killed by Nazi Germany before and during the Second World War.

summary.text: Provides for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor and memory of the Jews persecuted and killed by Nazi Germany during the Second World War.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor and memory of the Jews persecuted and killed by Nazi Germany before and during the Second World War.
